com.radius.server.packet
类 AccountingRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.radius.server.packet.RadiusPacket
      com.radius.server.packet.AccountingRequest

public class AccountingRequest
extends RadiusPacket

This class represents a Radius packet of the type "Accounting-Request".
